function_call.name: get_risks
function_call.arguments: {"risks":[{"Description":"Potential contamination of water sources with harmful chemicals or biological compounds.","Impact":"Increased risk of community exposure to hazardous substances and infectious agents.","Mitigation":"Regular monitoring and treatment of water sources, implementation of advanced filtration and purification technologies.","Technologies":"Advanced filtration systems, chemical analysis technologies, water treatment processes.","People":"Community members, public health officials, environmental protection agencies.","Owner":"Local authorities, water treatment companies, environmental protection agencies."},{"Description":"Lack of accurate interpretation of biomarkers in wastewater, leading to misrepresentation of community health and lifestyle habits.","Impact":"Inaccurate public health assessments and interventions based on misleading data.","Mitigation":"Validation of biomarker interpretation with medical and epidemiological expertise, comprehensive data analysis and cross-referencing with other health indicators.","Technologies":"Data analytics, medical expertise, epidemiological research methods.","People":"Public health officials, epidemiologists, medical professionals.","Owner":"Public health institutions, research organizations, medical institutions."}]}
